nodes.text: By 10 BBY, an Elixir of Omwat's Grace was part of the plunder seized from the pirate Hondo Ohnaka when he was captured by the Blazing Claw and their leader, Gunda Mabin. The elixir was included in an inventory of the assets taken that was included in the book that would become known as the Smuggler's Guide. Omwat was an astronomical object located in the Outer Rim Territories.
The Elixir of Omwat's Grace was mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and first published in 2018.
